name: Escape: An Interactive Short Story
description:
You awake to find yourself in the city dungeon, with no recollection of the previous night, and nothing but the clothes on your back. Make your own choices to escape the dungeon, find your way to freedom, or die trying. With 10 different endings, and 17 unique deaths, the odds are not in your favor.

Estimated playtime: 

~35 minutes  (For initial play through.)
~2 hours  (All endings and deaths.)

Credits 

Coding, writing, and art, done by me.

Sound effects found and edited using Blendwave and Audacity

Ambient background audio done by Moulaythami:
https://freesound.org/people/Moulaythami/sounds/546360/

Made in Game Maker Studio 2

Thank you for playing!
